title: DDFP 251: UFC's Jon Jones, mock draft
itunes:title: DDFP 251: UFC's Jon Jones, mock draft
description:
Dave, Rank and Handsome Hank discuss the latest NFL news including Geno Smith vs. Michael Vick, Andy Dalton's future with the Bengals and debate which team has had the best offseason so far. Plus, the guys partake in the #DDFP mock draft 2.0 before Shek chats with UFC champion Jon "Bones" Jones about Muhammad Ali and which NFL players could put up a good fight. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
